### Terick - Python Library
Publishing this library in hope it will help someone as it helped me. Have fun!

<br>
Includes 15 functions and 3 classes

```
bar()
unlist_words()
list_lines()
vanish_char()
interize()
toggle()
short_num()
limit_str()
text_align()
limit()
```
```
new_file()
load()
save()
zipdir()
unzip()
```
```
calc_avg()
get_max()
get_min()
```
```
Timer()

```
